text: João Justino Amaral dos Santos (25 December 1954 - 31 May 2024) was a Brazilian football player. He played for Brazil national team. On 31 May 2024, Amaral died from cancer in São Paulo, Brazil at the age of 69. == Club career statistics == |- |1972||rowspan="6"|Guarani||||0||0 |- |1973||rowspan="5"|Série A||34||0 |- |1974||22||0 |- |1975||22||0 |- |1976||17||0 |- |1977||14||0 |- |1978||rowspan="4"|Corinthians Paulista||Série A||4||0 |- |1979||||0||0 |- |1980||rowspan="2"|Série A||13||0 |- |1981||11||0 137||0 137||0 |} == International career statistics == |- |1975||3||0 |- |1976||7||0 |- |1977||6||0 |- |1978||12||0 |- |1979||8||0 |- |1980||4||0 |- !Total||40||0 |} ==Honours== ; Corinthans *Campeonato Paulista: 1979 ; Club América *Liga MX: 1983-84 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Footballers from Campinas Category:Cancer deaths in Brazil
